price: ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߞߵߌ ߘߊߘߐߖߊ߬ ߸ ߌ ߦߴߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߞߵߊߟߎ߫ ߕߊߞߍߕߊ ߟߐ߲߫ ߥߍ߫
arabic: وَإِن جَٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-in jādalūka faquli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā taʿmalūna
